text: Ka a masɔrɔn n ka faaninta kɛ n sɔrɔn tele seyinna lon de ma. Isirayɛlika le n di, ka bɔ Bɛniyaminu kabila rɔ, Heburuilu la Heburu le nde ri. N fanan tɛrɛ bilani sariya kɔfɛ Farisi mɔɔilu3.5 Farisi mɔɔilu: Yahudiyailu le tɛrɛ mɔɔ ɲinilu ri mɛnilu bɛnma ko tɛrɛ a ri, ii ye dina mira ɲa kelen ma. Iile le ka ii sɛɛbɛ don Nabi Musa la sariya mira ma ka tamin Yahudiya doilu la. Ii tɛrɛ ye ii benbailu fanan na namunilu mirala gbɛlɛman na. Iile tɛrɛ lani mɛlɛkailu la. Ii lani tɛrɛ a la ko mɔɔilu ri wuli saya rɔ. kɛɲa ma.
